task.title: How to Copy Resources to Output Directory using a Publishing Template

context.p: To copy additional resources to the output directory using a transformation scenario from Oxygen XML Editor/Author, follow this procedure:

step.cmd: We assume you have created a Publishing Template ()
Add a new fileset element in resources section of the template descriptor file.
Open the DITA Map WebHelp Responsive transformation scenario.
Use the Choose Custom Publishing Template and select your newly created template.
Click OK to save the changes to the transformation scenario.

result.p: All files from the custom resources directory will be copied to the /oxygen-webhelp/template folder.
